scripts.build: rm -rf _site && npm run build-css && npm run build-js && npm run build-hacks && npm run build-html
scripts.deploy: npm test && git push && npm run build && rsync -a -v -e ssh --delete _server _site nginx.conf node_modules supervisor.conf package.json feross@future:/home/feross/www/feross.org/
scripts.install-system-deps: brew install gsl && sudo gem install narray && sudo gem install jekyll bundler gsl classifier-reborn rouge
scripts.size: npm run size-js && npm run size-css
scripts.size-js: npm run build-js && cat client/bundle.js | gzip | wc -c
scripts.size-css: npm run build-css && cat css/main.css | gzip | wc -c
scripts.watch: npm run watch-css & npm run watch-html & npm run watch-js
